infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan business cards, QR codes for ticket validation, and create digital contacts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photos to let you save scanned business cards.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to find nearby networking events and connect with local professionals.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to record voice notes for contacts.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app accesses your contacts to save scanned business card information.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app accesses your calendar to add events and tickets.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking to provide personalized networking features and improve your experience.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access camera to scan QR codes and barcodes.
